title: John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site: Fees & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Fees & Reservations             Fees & Reservations      Fees Admission is free to all programs and park areas at the John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site. We do not sell the Annual Pass, Senior Pass, Military Pass or Access Pass. We apologize for any inconvenience. The nearest parks that sell these passes are: Adams National Historical Park (Quincy) and Lowell National Historical Park (Lowell). ReservationsThe site is now CLOSED for the winter season and will reopen on May 21, 2016. Guided tours are offered by appointment only, Monday through Friday. Please make your reservation request at least two weeks in advance by calling the site at 617-566-7937 or email us.    Â     NPS
